name: Read Marketo
description: This node reads data from Marketo Files

fields.name: instanceUrl
fields.title: Instance Url
fields.description: Instance URL to be used to access Marketo. It has to be specified without /rest. i.e it should be like https://119-AAA-888.mktorest.com

fields.name: object
fields.title: Object
fields.description: Object to be queried from Marketo. ex. leads

fields.name: filterValues
fields.title: Filter Values
fields.description: Comma separated filter values to be applied

fields.name: fromDate
fields.title: From Date
fields.description: (Optional) Datatime from which the data has to be fetched. It has to be in ISO 8601 format

fields.name: customObject
fields.title: Custom Object
fields.description: (Optional) Boolean to specify if the specified object is a custom object, default value is false

fields.name: apiVersion
fields.title: Api Version
fields.description: (Optional) API Version to be used. Default value is v1

fields.name: modifiedFields
fields.title: Modified Fields
fields.description: (Optional) Fields to be considered for LeadChanges. It has to be comma separated field names

fields.name: outputColNames
fields.title: Column Names for the Marketo
fields.description: New Output Columns of the SQL

fields.name: outputColTypes
fields.title: Column Types for the Marketo
fields.description: Data Type of the Output Columns
